attributes.action: Immediately stop the £55+ million daily EU subs on the referendum result - OUT
attributes.additional_details:
https://euobserver.com/news/126405
This article clearly states the fraud that is taking money from the British taxpayer.
http://www.theguardian.com/society/2014/jun/24/nhs-cash-problems-worse-next-year-report
This extra money could be fed into the NHS to help to ensure it does not fail & have to be privatized.
Local community projects halted & stalled due to austerity could now go forward & be paid for.
Existing EU subsidies maintained for a 12 month period whilst being examined & modified.
attributes.background:
Paying into a corrupt organisation (not signed off by auditors for 21 years) is a criminal waste of money.
The majority of this money must be paid into the NHS where it is urgently needed.
The rest of the money into community projects put forward by local people and not biased political parties.
